value.title: Store application data with Azure Blob storage
value.excerpt: Discover how to build an app that stores user files with Azure Blob storage, use Blob storage in a web app, and use the Azure Storage SDK for .NET Core.

value.title: Monitor and troubleshoot your end-to-end Azure network infrastructure by using network monitoring tools
value.excerpt: Learn how to investigate and diagnose problems in your Azure virtual networks by using Network Watcher and other tools.

value.title: An overview of Azure Blueprints | Azure Friday
value.excerpt: Alex Frankel (@sonofdiesel) joins Scott Hanselman (@shanselman) to discuss Azure Blueprints. Environment creation can be a long and error prone process. Azure Blueprints helps you deploy and update cloud environments in a repeatable manner using composable artifacts such as policies, role-based access
value.featuredContent: <iframe width="800" height="500" frameborder="0" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/cQ9D-d6KkMY" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture" allowfullscreen></iframe>

value.title: Azure Event Hubs for Apache Kafka | Azure Friday
value.excerpt: Shubha Vijayasarathy joins Scott Hanselman to discuss Azure Event Hubs, which makes data ingestion simple, secure, and scalable. As a distributed streaming platform, Event Hubs enables you to stream your data from any source—storing and processing millions of events per second— so you can build dynamic
value.featuredContent: <iframe width="800" height="500" frameborder="0" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/m3UEDhVYc-Q" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture" allowfullscreen></iframe>

value.title: Azure Friday | Azure Availability Zones
value.excerpt: Raj Ganapathy joins Scott Hanselman to discuss the new addition to Azure's resiliency offerings – Availability Zones. Azure Availability Zones are fault-isolated locations within an Azure region to help protect customers applications and data from datacenter-level failures with independent power, network,
value.featuredContent: <iframe width="800" height="500" frameborder="0" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/PP02QxplC2E" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture" allowfullscreen></iframe>

value.title: Azure Security Center | Azure Friday
value.excerpt: Kelly Anderson joins Scott Hanselman to discuss Azure Security Center, which offers built-in security management and threat protection for your cloud workloads. Azure Security Center helps you find & fix vulnerabilities, aids in blocking malicious access and alerts you when your resources are under attack.

value.title: How to create App Services in the Azure portal | Azure Portal Series
value.excerpt: In this video of the Azure Portal “How To” Series, you will learn how to create web apps using the Azure App service in the Azure portal. value.title: How to get started with Azure API Management | Azure Tips and Tricks
value.excerpt: In this edition of Azure Tips and Tricks, learn how to get started with Azure API Management, a service that helps protect and manage your APIs.   For more tips and tricks, visit: http://azuredev.tips     Get started with 12 months of free services and $200 USD in credit. Create your free account today

value.title: How to use Azure Bastion to connect securely to your Azure VMs | Azure Friday
value.excerpt: Using a bastion host can help limit threats such as port scanning and other types of malware targeting your VMs. Ashish Jain joins Scott Hanselman to show how Azure Bastion gives you secure and seamless RDP and SSH access to your virtual machines. Now you can securely access your VMs over SSL from the

value.title: Azure Data Fundamentals: Explore non-relational data in Azure

topItems.title: Explore non-relational data offerings in Azure
topItems.excerpt: Explore non-relational data offerings in Azure

topItems.title: Explore provisioning and deploying non-relational data services in Azure
topItems.excerpt: Explore provisioning and deploying non-relational data services in Azure

topItems.title: Manage non-relational data stores in Azure
topItems.excerpt: Explore non-relational data stores in Azure

value.title: Azure Fundamentals part 4: Describe general security and network security features
value.excerpt: Learn about the various Azure services you can use to help ensure that your cloud resources are safe, secure, and trusted.

topItems.title: Introduction to Azure Fundamentals
topItems.excerpt: This module introduces you to the basics of Azure.

topItems.title: Protect against security threats on Azure
topItems.excerpt: Learn how Azure can help you protect the workloads you run both in the cloud and in your on-premises datacenter.

topItems.title: Secure network connectivity on Azure
topItems.excerpt: Learn about the various Azure services you can use to help ensure that your network is safe, secure, and trusted.

value.title: Evaluate text with Azure Cognitive Language Services
value.excerpt: Learn how to use Cognitive Language Services to analyze text, determine intent, detect adult themes, and process natural language input

topItems.title: Classify and moderate text with Azure Content Moderator
topItems.excerpt: In this module, we'll introduce you to Azure Content Moderator and show how to use it for text moderation

topItems.title: Add conversational intelligence to your apps by using Language Understanding Intelligent Service (LUIS)
topItems.excerpt: In this module, we'll introduce you to Language Understanding Intelligent Service (LUIS) and show how to build and publish a LUIS model

topItems.title: Discover sentiment in text with the Text Analytics API
topItems.excerpt: Learn how to use the Text Analytics API and Azure Functions to discover what your customers are really saying in their feedback about your products or brands.

value.title: Implement a Data Warehouse with Azure Synapse Analytics
value.excerpt: Azure Synapse Analytics provides a relational big data store that can scale to Petabytes of data. In this learning path, you will learn how Azure Synapse Analytics can achieve this scale with its’ Massively Parallel Processing (MPP) architecture. Create a data warehouse in minutes and use familiar querying language to build reports. Load massive amounts of data in minutes, and ensure that your data warehouse is secure.

topItems.title: Design a data warehouse with Azure Synapse Analytics
topItems.excerpt: Learn how to create a data warehouse in Azure Synapse Analytics in minutes to take advantage of massively parallel processing (MPP) and run complex queries at petabyte scale quickly

topItems.title: Query data in Azure Synapse Analytics
topItems.excerpt: Learn how to issue simple queries against Azure Synapse Analytics and how to visualize the data in both Excel and Power BI

topItems.title: Import data into Azure Synapse Analytics by using PolyBase
topItems.excerpt: Load petabytes of data into an Azure Synapse Analytics database in minutes by using PolyBase

value.title: Process and classify images with the Azure Cognitive Vision Services
value.excerpt: Microsoft Cognitive Services offers pre-built functionality to enable computer vision functionality in your applications.  Learn how to use the Cognitive Vision Services to detect faces, tag and classify images, and identify objects

topItems.title: Identify faces and expressions by using the Computer Vision API in Azure Cognitive Services
topItems.excerpt: Learn how to use the artificial intelligence algorithms in the Computer Vision API in Azure to identify facial details in images.

topItems.title: Process images with the Computer Vision service
topItems.excerpt: Use the Computer Vision API to analyze images for insights, extract text from images, and generate high-quality thumbnails.

topItems.title: Classify images with the Microsoft Custom Vision Service
topItems.excerpt: In this learning path, find out how Cognitive Vision Services detects faces, tags and classifies images, and identifies objects.

value.title: Analyze images with the Computer Vision service
value.excerpt: The Computer Vision service enables software engineers to create intelligent solutions that extract information from images; a common task in many artificial intelligence (AI) scenarios.

value.title: Dynamically meet changing web app performance requirements with autoscale rules
value.excerpt: Respond to periods of high activity by incrementally adding resources, and then removing these resources when activity drops, to reduce costs.

value.title: Scale an App Service web app to efficiently meet demand with App Service scale up and scale out
value.excerpt: Learn how to respond to periods of increased activity by incrementally increasing the resources available and then freeing these resources when activity drops.

value.title: Explore Azure compute services
value.excerpt: Learn about the different services that are available in Azure Compute.

value.title: Enable automatic updates in a web application using Azure Functions and SignalR Service
value.excerpt: Update a web app's notification mechanism from polling to push-based architecture with SignalR Service, Azure Cosmos DB and Azure Functions.

value.title: Explore Azure networking services
value.excerpt: Learn about the core networking resources that are available in Azure, such as Virtual Networks, VPN Gateway, and ExpressRoute.

value.title: Deploy and configure servers, instances, and databases for Azure SQL
value.excerpt: Deploy and configure servers, instances, and databases for Azure SQL

value.title: Microsoft Azure Well-Architected Framework - Reliability
value.excerpt: Learn how to recover from infrastructure and service failure, loss of data, and disasters by incorporating reliability into your architecture.

value.title: Back up and restore your Azure SQL database
value.excerpt: Protect the data in your Azure SQL database and recover from data loss or corruption with backup and restore.

value.title: Build and run a web application with the MEAN stack on an Azure Linux virtual machine
value.excerpt: Learn how to decide if the MEAN stack is a good choice for you and set up a MEAN-based web application on a new Azure Linux virtual machine.

value.title: Classify and moderate text with Azure Content Moderator
value.excerpt: In this module, we'll introduce you to Azure Content Moderator and show how to use it for text moderation

value.title: Classify images with the Microsoft Custom Vision Service
value.excerpt: In this learning path, find out how Cognitive Vision Services detects faces, tags and classifies images, and identifies objects.

value.title: Understand virtualization
value.excerpt: Carnegie Mellon University's Cloud Developer course. Take a deep dive into virtualization by understanding its formal definition as well as the different types of virtual machines.

value.title: Create a build pipeline with Azure Pipelines
value.excerpt: Set up a continuous integration (CI) pipeline that automates the process of building your application.

value.title: Create security baselines
value.excerpt: Create security baselines

value.title: Deploy MariaDB, MySQL, and PostgreSQL on Azure
value.excerpt: Compare Open Source Azure Database offerings with Azure SQL Server offerings. Configure an Open Source database and configure high availability and security options.
